column1: #Text=This lexicon is a collection of terms and annotations, as described in:
#Text=- [Crowdsourcing for Beyond Polarity Sentiment Analysis A Pure Emotion Lexicon](https://arxiv.org/abs/1710.04203)
#Text=- [A Multivalued Emotion Lexicon Created and Evaluated by the Crowd](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8554956)
#Text=**Please cite the aforementioned papers, if you find the lexicon useful for your research.**
#Text=**Stem**: the stem derived from terms in "terms" column
#Text=**Anticipation, joy, trust, fear, sadness, disgust, anger, surprise**: emotion classes
#Text=**None**: stop-words, not emotion evocative, or not intensifying terms
#Text=**Total**: the total number of annotations received
